description: This file defines the NoteViewModel class, which manages UI-related data for notes in an Android MVVM architecture. It interacts with a repository to perform CRUD operations and provides LiveData streams for the notes data.

classes.name: NoteViewModel
classes.description: A ViewModel class that provides data and handles operations related to notes, such as retrieval, search, insert, update, and delete. It manages LiveData streams for the list of notes and search results, ensuring data persistence across configuration changes.

methods.name: NoteViewModel
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the repository and LiveData objects for all notes and search results.

methods.name: getAllNotes
methods.description: Returns a LiveData stream of all notes.

methods.name: getNoteById
methods.description: Retrieves a specific note by its ID via the repository.

methods.name: getSearchResults
methods.description: Returns a LiveData stream of search results.

methods.name: searchNotes
methods.description: Performs a search query on notes; updates searchResults LiveData with matching notes or resets to all notes if query is empty.

methods.name: insert
methods.description: Inserts a new note via the repository.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note via the repository.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note via the repository.
